src: LC : Hello . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) RP : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) @ G ( LC+RP , go-to ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] LC : Ok. [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] [end] ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )
tgt: ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . # inform ( appt ( general_info ) ) RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? # thank ( ) ; change-volume ( turn_up ) ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . # offer-help ( ) LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( )

src: LC : Well , it 's not possible to get information on appointments . But um , how long does it last because there are three phases , if I understood correctly there are three ... three types of appointments , I 'd like to know how long it will last in total . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : Well , in the meantime , what we can maybe do , since I 've just found my appointment paper and I know what time it starts , we could maybe go for lunch . From what time until what time can we have lunch ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : And ... Is it ? ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . [MASK] LC : And ... ARI : No . [MASK] LC : I 'm going to take the lift . I do n't remember where it is to go to the appointment room and see if someone can give information on appointments . [MASK] [MASK] [end] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . src: [start] ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? [MASK] RP : Can you ask if there is a cafeteria ? Because I 'd really like a coffee before the consultation . [MASK] [MASK] LC : Yes . [MASK] LC : Um hello , could you tell me the address um where the cafeteria is ? Because my friend would like to get something . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Yes of course . There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] [MASK] RP : I really need to go to the toilet before going to the consultation . Can you ask where the toilet is please ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : I 'm going to speak for my friend . My friend would like to go to the toilet before her consultation . Can you tell me where it is ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : Very easy ! You have to go to the corridor at the end of the room . It 's the second door on the right . [MASK] [MASK] RP : To go and see the person I told you about , I do n't know exactly where it is or which department it 's in , but it 's room 17 . Can he tell us a bit more about where this room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] LC : Um , do you know where room 17 is ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : You continue along the building , take the lift , and it 's on the second floor . [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] [MASK] RC : How do I get to room 17 ? Do I have to take the lift ? [MASK] [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] [MASK] LP : How long before my appointment ?
